mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEM_TBL( mem_id, mem_name, mem_pw, mem_zipcode, mem_addr, mem_de_addr, mem_phone, mem_email, mem_rec_email ) VALUES( #{mem_id}, #{mem_name}, #{mem_pw}, #{mem_zipcode}, #{mem_addr}, #{mem_de_addr}, #{mem_phone}, #{mem_email}, #{mem_rec_email} )
mapper.select: SELECT mem_id FROM mem_tbl WHERE mem_id = #{mem_id}
